mdRecord.dcterms:title: Goodykoontz Cemetery
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Location update 2021: Located on the side of a hill in a stand of white pines on the SE corner of Laurel Branch Rd NW and Wildwood Rd NW. It is within sight of the Goodykoontz House at 3071 Laurel Branch Rd.. The house and cemetery are currently owned by Daniel and Mark Grim. This is a large cemetery with early settlers of the Laurel Branch area buried in it. N 36 53.402' W 80 24.186'
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lists
Cemeteries
